body:
@Zero623 It's implied NTR since she's very much in love with Kodaka. He doesn't have to exactly be present to have him be replaced in her heart. 

Agreed on your side now. I would gladly hog her all to myself. Yozora can go be passed around like the stupid whore bitch that she is.

Where's the NTR? Kodaka isn't even in this.

On a side note, who on Earth willingly shares a girl like Sena?
Fuck you very very  much  hope you die even sena :)
